items.title: Canada Releases New Smoking Cessation Guideline for Adults
items.description: The document offers a menu of options to help adults quit smoking tobacco. Medscape Medical News

items.title: Very Abnormal Results Rare in DMARD Toxicity Monitoring
items.description: Even for adverse effects that do occur, prevention typically is not possible using long-term routine lab monitoring. Medscape Medical News

items.title: Probiotics Can Reduce Heart Disease Risk Factors
items.description: Certain probiotics can lower cholesterol, reduce inflammation, and support better heart and circulatory health. Medscape Medical News

items.title: BRCA Carriers Conceive After Pregnancy-Related Breast Cancer
items.description: Over a third of young BRCA carriers who are diagnosed with breast cancer during pregnancy conceive again without adverse maternal or foetal outcomes, ...
